page.title: 07INDUSTRY
page.content: Mole Valley Farmers limited was started in 1960 by a small group of farmers in the South Molton area of North Devon.They wanted to buy farms requirements in large quantities so that they could receive large discounts.Mole Valley are the largest employers in the area.They have eighteen employees who work from 8am to 5:30pm and rhey have their dinner break from 1pm to 1:45pm.They work five days a week and sometimes on Saturday from 8am to 12:30pm.They make steel gates , cattle crushes , silage barns , Dutch barns and different sized sheds built to the farmers requirement.As well as the cattle crush they make cattle crush yolks.They deliver goods as far as Gloucester and down to Redruth in Cornwall.
